SA19n1288:13: tatra svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavantaṃ prayogaṃ darśayituṃ sautrāntikamatamāśritya bhagavatā yaduktaṃ -
SA19n1288:16: sametya sambhūya hetupratyayaiḥ kṛtaṃ vastujātaṃ saṃskṛtam |
SA19n1288:19: ' sarvaṃ tāvat ghaṭādikaṃ vastu mudgarādisannidhau nāśaṃ gacchat dṛśyate |
SA19n1288:20: tatra yena svarupeṇa antyāvasthāyāṃ ghaṭādikaṃ vinaśyati taccet svarupamutpannamātrasya vidyate tadānīmutpādānantarameva tena vinaṣṭavyamiti vyaktamasya kṣaṇikatvam |'
SA19n1288:23: ' evaṃ tarhi mudgarādisannidhāne ca eṣa eva asya svabhava iti punarapyanena tāvantameva kālaṃ sthātavyam ,
SA19n1288:25: tasmāt kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvenāpyutpattau prathamakṣaṇavad dvitīyakṣaṇe'pi kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvāt punaraparaṃ kṣaṇadvayamavatiṣṭheta |
SA19n1288:31: vināśaśca tasya virodhina balena kriyata iti ?
SA19n1288:32: na hyetatsambhavati jīvati devadatto maraṇaṃ cāsya bhavatīti |
SA19n1288:35: na hi mriyate cāmaraṇadharmā ceti yujyate vaktum |
SA19n1288:41: prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyat vinaśvarasvarupaṃ tattadanantarānavasthāyi yathā antyakṣaṇavartighaṭasya svarupam |
SA19n1288:45: kathaṃ tarhi sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt ?
SA19n1288:47: tenākāreṇa vailakṣaṇyasyābhāvād bhāvena cāvyavadhānāt bhede'pi sa evāyamityabhedādhyavasāyapratyayaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ prasūyate |
SA19n1288:48: atyantabhinneṣvapi ca lūnapunarjātakuśakeśādiṣvapi dṛṣṭa eva sa evāyamiti pratyayaḥ |
SA19n1288:50: tasmātsarva saṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikamiti sidhdamevaitat nirviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetorayaṃ prayoga iti ||
SA19n1288:64: yadā saiva vyāvṛttirvyāvṛttyantaravyavacchedena vyatiriktocyate bhāvasyotpattiriti tadā kalpitena bhedena svabhāvabhūtadharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo hetuḥ |
SA19n1288:66: tathā bhinnaviśeṣaṇasya prayogaḥ - yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
SA19n1288:69: yathā cātra citragośabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācako'sti na tathā kṛtakaśabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakaṃ kimapyasti |
SA19n1288:71: ucyate - apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ ityucyate |
SA19n1288:72: tatraḥ kṛtakaśabdaḥ paravyāpārasāpekṣaṃ svabhābaṃ prakṛtyaiva vadan bhinnaviśeṣaṇamevāha ||
SA19n1288:74: prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvasya prayogaḥ - yaḥ pratyayabhedabhedī sa kṛtakaḥ ,
SA19n1288:78: tasya bhedastena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī |
SA19n1288:79: kāraṇamahattvena mahattvaṃ kāraṇālpatvenālpatvaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ pratyayabhedabhediśabdasya bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakasyātra prayuktatvāt prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇo'yam |
SA19n1288:80: svabhāvahetoḥ nānāprabhedadarśanaṃ ca vyāmohanivṛttaye dharmabhedakalpanayāpi svabhāvahetureva prayujyata iti pratipādayitum |
SA19n1288:82: svabhāvahetorvaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yadyadā'nantarānavasthāyi na bhavati na tattadā vinaśvararupaṃ,
SA19n1288:85: vyatirekaprayoge sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptatvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato bhavatīti bodhdavyam |
SA19n1288:86: tathā'paro'pi vaidharmyavān prayogaḥ - yatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāsti tatra sattvamapi nāsti,
SA19n1288:95: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapi nāsti,
SA19n1288:99: kāryahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ,
SA19n1288:102: kāryaheturapi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sidhda eva kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇe sādhye prayoktavyaḥ |
SA19n1288:103: vaidharmyaprayogo yathā asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūmaḥ yathā - mahāhrade |
SA19n1288:106: anupalabdheḥ sādharmyavan prayogo'vayavinirākaraṇāya yathā - yadyatropalavdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatrāsadvyavahārayogyam ,
SA19n1288:110: anupalabdhervaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatsadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva,
SA19n1288:114: sarvatra sādharmyavati sādhanavākye sādhyena sādhanaṃ vyāptam |
SA19n1288:115: baidharmyavati [punaḥ] sādhanavākye sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvo vyāpta iti pratipattavyam |
SA19n1288:117: niyatatvakathanaṃ sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāve niyatatvakathanaṃ nāma vyāptirabhidhīyate |
SA19n1288:118: tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisidhdau satyāṃ nedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca syāta,
SA19n1288:119: sādhyaṃ ca tatra dharmiṇi na syāditi |
SA19n1288:121: yatra pramāṇena sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptireva na sidhdā ,
SA19n1288:125: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhagavān bhavatu vā mā bhūt ,
SA19n1288:127: tathā hi , loke trayaḥ khalu bhāvāḥ kecinniścitakartṛkāḥ ,
SA19n1288:134: tatra ye dṛśyamānotpattayo vanaspatyādayo ye ca cirotpannā viśvambharādayaḥ te sarve sandigdhakartṛtvena vyavatiṣṭhamānā budhdimatkartṛkāḥ kāryatvāt ,
SA19n1288:142: tathāhi - kārya tāvat budhdimataḥ kumbhakārādupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyena mānasa pratyakṣeṇopalabdham |
SA19n1288:143: tadyadi budhdimantareṇāpi syāt tadānīṃ budhdimataḥ sakāśātkadācidapi nopajāyeta |
SA19n1288:145: tasmānnedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ kāryaṃ ca syāt na budhdimaddhetukamiti |
SA19n1288:146: atredamabhidhīte - sādhanaṃ khalu sarvatra sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhareṇa pramāṇena vyāptau sidhdāyāṃ sādhyaṃ gamayediti sarvavādisammatam |
SA19n1288:147: tatra yadi dṛsyaśarīraviśiṣṭena budhdimatā vyāptirgṛhyate tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpi jāyamāne tṛṇādau kāryatvasya darśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko'yaṃ hetuḥ |
SA19n1288:149: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣo bhavitumarhati-
SA19n1288:152: evaṃ dhūme'pi vyabhicāro vaktuṃ sulabha eva? tanna |
SA19n1288:153: aśakyārohaṇatvena parvate dahanasya draṣṭumaśakyatvāt yuktaṃ tatra sandigdhaviṣayatvam |
SA19n1288:154: prastute tu dṛśyaśarīraviśiṣṭena budhdimatā vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dṛśyānupalambhena budhdimato bādho bhavatīti yuktam |
SA19n1288:155: atha dṛśyaśarīreṇa budhdimanmātreṇa vā vyāptiravagamyate tadā adṛśyasya budhdimanmātrasya vā sādhyasya dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsidhdeḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko'yaṃ hetuḥ |
SA19n1288:156: sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhānābhāvasya [kāśadāva] sidhdatvena vyāpterabhāvāt tathā coktam jñānaśrīmitrapādaiḥ |
SA19n1288:171: ato dhūmasya dahanena saha sambandhe bhaviṣyatyupādhiḥ |
SA19n1288:185: dhūmādikaṃ vastu svābhāvika sambandhena sambadhdaṃ na sarvam' iti |
SA19n1288:187: yathā dhūmākhyaṃ vastu dahanāyattamiti pramāṇasidhdiṃ tathā kiṃ svābhāvikasambandho'pi pramāṇasidhdaḥ ,
SA19n1288:191: svahetorvā bhūtaḥ ahetuko vā iti trayo vikalpāḥ |
SA19n1288:198: kiñca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāptisidhdiḥ |
SA19n1288:204: ākāśe hi yathā budhdimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā acetanasyāpi kāraṇasya nivṛttirnāstyeva |
SA19n1288:207: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya budhdimadanvayadarśanādākāśe'pi budhdimadabhāvādeva kāryatvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyate,
SA19n1288:208: yasmādanayostādātmyaṃ tadutpattiranyo vā svābhāvikādisambandhaḥ pūrvapramāṇena na prasādhitaḥ syādityuktam |
SA19n1288:211: tathā hi , vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇa nivṛttirucyate |
SA19n1288:216: yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt ,
SA19n1288:225: ' viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa eva saṃśayo bhavati tato yathādarśanameva śaṅkitumucitam ' iti |
SA19n1288:228: tathā hi - [ kāryatvadhūmatvayoḥ ] tādātmyatadutpattisambandha viyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tanmatenāpi sajātīyatvam |
SA19n1288:235: tadidānīṃ svamatenaivānena vādinā niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānenātmā bādhita ityupekṣaṇiyo'yaṃ devānāṃ priyaḥ ||
SA19n1288:237: nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānulambhato vyāptistadā santānāntarānumānaṃ na syāt ,
SA19n1288:241: na caivaṃ vyāvahārikendriyapratyakṣamātrabudhdimanmātraṃ jaṭharacitrasādhāraṇaṃ vahnimātraṃ vā gocaro yujyate ,
SA19n1288:243: tasmāt dṛśyenaiva vahninā dhūmasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptiriti nyāyaḥ ||
SA19n1288:246: atha eko nityaḥ sarvajña ityādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabudhdimatpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate ,
SA19n1288:247: tadā evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena sādhyena saha kāryatvasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇena vyāpterasidhderanaikāntikatvam |
SA19n1288:248: atha sāmānyena vyāptimādāya viśeṣasya pakṣadharmatābalāt sidhdirucyate ?
SA19n1288:250: yena sādhyagatena viśeṣaṇena vinā hetorvṛttirdharmiṇi na ghaṭate,
SA19n1288:255: tadvad budhdimato'pi śarīrādivṛttitvaṃ yadi sidhyati, siddhyatu |
SA19n1288:266: kīṭakādīnāṃ ca hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadapi kathaṃ vāryate ?
SA19n1288:269: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptirdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇenāvaśyaṃ darśayitavyeti sthitam |
SA19n1288:275: nanu sādharmyavati sādhanavākye anvaya evoktaḥ na tu vyatirekaḥ |
SA19n1288:278: tatkathamābhyāṃ trirupaṃ liṅgaṃ kathyata iti cet ,
SA19n1288:282: vyatirekāgṛhītau ca sādhyābhāve'pi na sādhanābhāva iti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ |
SA19n1288:286: anvayagṛhītau hi sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na bhavediti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ |
SA19n1288:287: evaṃ ca vyatireka eva na bhavet |
SA19n1288:293: tadubhayaṃ sukhāvabodhārtha kathyate - svabhāvahetoḥ sattvalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva grahītavyeti kecit |
SA19n1288:297: sattvādanyeṣāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāmanupalambhahetūnāṃ ca dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirgrahītavyā |
SA19n1288:301: sādhyaviparyayabādhakapramāṇena vā kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇena svasaṃvedanasāmarthyasidhdervikalpasidhdervā vastutvāvastutvābhyāṃ sandihyamāne vipakṣe dharmiṇi,
SA19n1288:304: , anupalambhasya tu asadvyavahārayogyatvena saha vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva |
SA19n1288:305: , anyeṣāṃ tu svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāṃ vā keṣāñcit ,
SA19n1288:313: ayaṃ heturaparajīvaccharīre ātmanā vyāpta iti na niścitaḥ |
SA19n1288:314: ghaṭe ca vipakṣe ātmano'bhāvānnivṛtta iti na niścitaḥ |
SA19n1288:315: dharmiṇi tu jīvaccharīre vidyata iti asādhāraṇānaikāntika ucyate |
SA19n1288:324: sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena saha vyāptiḥ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparpayābhyāṃ grahītavyeti ,
SA19n1288:329: tathā hi - yadanekavṛtti tadanekaṃ yathā anekabhājanagataṃ tālafam |
SA19n1288:339: asyāyamarthaḥ - vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sambandhe sati yadi vyāpakaṃ neṣyate tadā vyāpyamapi neṣyatām |
SA19n1288:341: vādinā sādhanā upanyaste prativādinā tatra dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nyāyaḥ |
SA19n1288:351: vaiyarthyaṃ tu yatropanyasyate tatra sandigdhasādhyadharmakatvaṃ hetorlakṣaṇaṃ hetau na sambhavatīti asidhda ucyate |
SA19n1288:355: na hi hetoḥ sāmarthya nāma hetusvarupādanyat |
SA19n1288:360: yatra tu dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ sādhayitumārabdhaṃ tasya dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇabādhitve āśrayāsidhdirhetordūṣaṇam |
SA19n1288:366: tena ca yadi nāma viśvaṃ vyāptaṃ tadapi yadupabhogāyatanatayā pareṇa parigṛhītaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ tadeva sātmakamabhidhīyata iti |
SA19n1288:371: mānasasyāpyahaṃpratyayasya śarīrādiviṣayatvāt gauro'haṃ sthūlo'haṃ gacchāmyahamityādyākāreṇa ahaṃ pratyaya utpadyate yadāha alaṅkārakāraḥ -
SA19n1288:374: na cāsya śarīravyatiriktasya taddharmo gauratvaṃ sthūlatvaṃ vā |
SA19n1288:375: na ca vibhoramūrttasya mūrtadravyānuvidhāyinī gamanakriyā yuktimatī |
SA19n1288:376: na cāyaṃ māṇavake siṃhapratyaya eva bhākto yuktaḥ ,
SA19n1288:388: yadi bodharupo nityaśca tadā cakṣurādivaifalyaprasaṅgo durvāraḥ |
SA19n1288:391: athābodharupo dṛśyaśca tadā'nupalambho'sya sattāṃ na kṣamata iti nirātmasidhdiranavadyā |
SA19n1288:400: tathā hi - na svalakṣaṇābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītuṃ śakyā |
SA19n1288:403: tatra ca yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyena vyāptaṃ na pratīyate tadā sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na syādityanaikāntikameva bhavati ||
SA19n1288:407: tatkathaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmānyābhyāṃ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ pramāṇena gṛhyate ?
SA19n1288:409: yato yādṛśaṃ sāmānyaṃ paraiḥ parikalpyate tādṛśaṃ pramāṇena bādhyata iti nābhyupeyate tatsaugataiḥ |
SA19n1288:412: yathādhyavasāyaṃ bāhya eva ghaṭādirartha apoha ityabhidhīyate ,
SA19n1288:415: apohyate pṛthak kriyate'smin buddhyākāre vijātīyamiti kṛtvā |
SA19n1288:421: yattu gopratītau na gavātmā agavātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam |
SA19n1288:422: anyāpohapratipattau ca sāmarthyādanyapoḍho gavādirartho'vadhāryata iti nivṛttyapohavādināṃ matam |
SA19n1288:425: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati ,
SA19n1288:431: yathā nīlotpalasaṃketitendīvaraśabdāt utpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlamasfuraṇamanivāryaṃ tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍha eva vastuni saṃketitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt apohasya agavāpoha- sfuraṇamanivāryam |
SA19n1288:435: kathaṃ tarhi anyaparihāreṇa pratipattā gavi vartatām |
SA19n1288:444: kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ |
SA19n1288:450: tasmāt paramārthato na svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdairabhidhīyata iti sthitam ||
SA19n1288:451: nanu yathā pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭasvarupe gṛhīte'paścāttatraiva kṣaṇikatvādiniścayārtha pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate ,
SA19n1288:452: tathā vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe pratipādite satvāṃśaniścayārthameva sadādipadaprayogo bhaviṣyatīti cet , na |
SA19n1288:455: gṛhīte svarupe kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇa paraṃ grahītavyamiti ||
SA19n1288:458: anekavyaktisamavetaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ nityaṃ tādṛśasya sattāsādhakaṃ na kiñcitpramāṇāmupalabhāmahe |
SA19n1288:460: tathā hi - gavādivyaktyanubhavakāle varṇāsaṃsthānādyātmakaṃ vyaktisvarupamapahāya nānyat kiñcidekamanuyāyi pratyakṣe bhāsate |
SA19n1288:467: dṛṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sāmarthyaṃ bhedāviśeṣe'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnām |
SA19n1288:471: kiñca sarvagate vijātīyād vyāvṛtte satyapi sāmānye kiṃ bhedāviśeṣe'pi govyaktiṣveva samavetaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ tatraiva caikākārāṃ budhdiṃ janayatīti praśne svabhāvenaivetyuttaraṃ parasya |
SA19n1288:487: svarupavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvādijātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitabhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya bhāvasyeṣṭatvāt |
SA19n1288:492: sāmānyasya niṣedhāya prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatra asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ ,
SA19n1288:494: nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ paridṛśyamānāsu vyaktiṣviti svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ |
SA19n1288:496: varṇasaṃsthānalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktisvarupamapahāya dvitīyasyānuyāyino rupasya nipuṇamapi nirupyamāṇasya sarvathā darśanābhāvāt ,
SA19n1288:504: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnyamiti sthitam ||
SA19n1288:507: tathā hi - asya jagataḥ karttā bhavan nityo vā bhavedanityo vā |
SA19n1288:509: nitye karttari samarthe sati sargasthitipralayānāṃ niyamena yaugapadyaprasaṅgāt |
SA19n1288:510: yena hi svarupeṇa sthitipralayayoḥ sa karttā tadasya svarupaṃ sargakāle'pi sannihitamiti tadaiva sthitipralayau kuryāt |
SA19n1288:512: na hi nityena sahakāriṇā kadācidapyayaṃ virahitaḥ sadā sannihitatvāt |
SA19n1288:519: ucyate - tā apīcchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa evāsyopālambhaḥ |
SA19n1288:520: atha svarupeṇa sāmarthye satyapi eṣa eva tasya svabhāvaḥ ,
SA19n1288:522: tarhi mātā'pi sati vandhyā sā prakṛtyaivaitadapi vaktavyaṃ bhavedbhavatāmiti yatkiñcidetat ||
SA19n1288:525: sahakāriṇamapekṣyaiva paścādbhavati [ nāsyopālambha iti ] tanna yuktam |
SA19n1288:526: samartho hi sahakāryapekṣāmanādṛtya balādeva kāryaṃ kuryāt |
SA19n1288:534: etena ātmādīnāmakṣaṇikānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ ca krameṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ pratyuktam |
SA19n1288:542: janmavināśāvadhipratibhāsaprasaṅgāditi nedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pūrvāparakālavyāptamarthaṃ kañcidapi grahītumalam |
SA19n1288:549: atha mataṃ bhavedidaṃ smaraṇaṃ yadidānīntanamavasthānaṃ na sākṣātkuryāt ,
SA19n1288:552: ' pūrvapramitamātre hi jāyate sa iti smṛtiḥ |
SA19n1288:560: yena hi svarupeṇa smaraṇaṃ na tena svarupeṇa grahaṇamityanunmattena śakyate vaktum |
SA19n1288:569: pratyabhijñā pratyayaścāyaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlādīti pratyaya iti virudhdavyāptopalabdhiḥ |
SA19n1288:570: ekatvānekatvayoḥ parasparavirodhāt tadviṣayakasaṃvedanayorapi virodhaḥ tenaikālambanatvena anekālambanatvavirudhdena anekālambanatvena pūrvoktyā nītyā pratyabhijñāpratyayo vyāpta iti na pratyabhijñānaṃ kṣaṇikānumānabādhakam |
SA19n1288:571: na ca keśādiṣvapi sāmānyālambanatayā ekālambanatvam keśādivyaktereva pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt |
SA19n1288:579: yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ ,
SA19n1288:588: ' ākāśaṃ dvau nirodhau ca nityaṃ trayamasaṃskṛtam |
SA19n1288:597: saṅkalparuḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyaviṣayākārāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ cetoguṇamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt |
SA19n1288:601: abhyāsena sahitacetoguṇasfuṭapratibhāsayoḥ kāraṇakāryayoḥ kumbhakāraghaṭayoriva sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasidhdau abhyāsasahitacetoguṇatvasya sādhanasya sfuṭapratibhāsakāraṇayogyatayā vyāptisidhdeḥ |
SA19n1288:602: tathā hi - vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sfuṭābhatvasya paścādabhyāsasaṃvedanaṃ ,
SA19n1288:603: sfuṭābhasaṃvedanamiti trividhapratyakṣānupalambhasādhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sfuṭapratibhāsābhyāsa sahitacittākārayorityupapannā sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ |
SA19n1288:605: nanvanena sādhanena caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkaraṇāt caturāryasatyākārasākṣatkārī vivakṣitassarvajñaḥ sidhyati ,
SA19n1288:618: vacanamātrasya saṃśayaviparyāsapūrvakatve'pi pramāṇa saṃvādi ] niścitārthasya [ vacanasya ] sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā tadarthasākṣātkārijñānapūrvakatvena pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmupalambhāt |
SA19n1288:621: syādetat | anekabhavaparamparālakṣaṇena dīrghakālena bhāvyasya saṅkalpāruḍhasya sfuṭābhatvaṃ sambhāvyate |
SA19n1288:630: iha pūrvajanmābhyāsāt tapodānādhyayanādau sarvasattvānāmabhyāse pravṛttiriti pravādaḥ |
SA19n1288:631: tatastatsidhdaye pramāṇamucyate - yaccittaṃ tat cittāntarapūrvakaṃ yathedānīntanaṃ cittam |
SA19n1288:642: ' ākāśaṃ dvau nirodhau ca nityaṃ trayamasaṃskṛtam |
SA19n1288:650: yadi saṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate |
SA19n1288:651: na cetsaṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate ||
SA19n1288:655: na hi sarvatra sarvadā nīlādaya ākārāḥ prakāśante |
SA19n1288:658: tasmādasti kiñcideṣāṃ samanantarapratyayavyatiriktaṃ yadbalena kvacit kadācit bhavantīti śakyamavasātum |
SA19n1288:665: na cāsati samavāyini dravye samavāya iti tadduṣaṇamatra nādriyate |
SA19n1288:666: dravyaṃ ca pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti navavidham |
SA19n1288:695: yatra hi sapratighaṃ dravyamasti na tatrākāśamavakāśaṃ vā dadāti |
SA19n1288:696: yatra nāsti tatra tadabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ sidhda iti kva vā''kāśamavakāśaṃ dadyāt ?
SA19n1288:697: [ yasmādavakāśapradamākāśaṃ bhaṇyate ] tasmāt satyasmin sarvadā sarvathā sarvatrāvakāśaḥ syāt |
SA19n1288:702: taccaikamiti cet samānadeśatvāt sarvaśabdānāṃ vibhāgena śravaṇaṃ na syāt |
SA19n1288:709: yadi punarmano [ nityaṃ ] syāttadānīmetāni jñānāni na yujyante |
SA19n1288:714: tatra yo'vayavī ghaṭādiḥ paramāṇubhidvaryaṇukādi krameṇārabdhaḥ prasidhdaḥ ,
SA19n1288:716: yadyavayavī nāsti kathaṃ tarhyayamekatvena pratibhāsata iti cet -
SA19n1288:721: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ ' pratibhāsadharmaḥ sthaulyam ' ityuktaṃ dharmottareṇa,
SA19n1288:724: tasmādyo'yaṃ nīlādiprabhāso nānādeśavyāpitvenānubhūyate sa eva sthūlapratibhāsa ityadoṣaḥ ye'pi tadārambhakāḥ paramāṇavo vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ ,
SA19n1288:730: yo hyasya svabhāvaḥ pūrvaparamāṇupratyāsannaḥ na sa evāparaparamāṇupratyāsanno ghaṭate |
SA19n1288:732: evaṃ ca sa pūrvaparamāṇusannihitasvabhāvo'paraparamāṇuṃ pratyāsīdedyadi so'pi tatra syāt |
SA19n1288:741: tathā hi - yadyasau sāṃśaḥ kathaṃ paramāṇuḥ ?
SA19n1288:742: atha niraṃśaḥ tadā saṃyuktāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ sarvātmanā saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśāḥ syuriti sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraṃ syāt ,
SA19n1288:745: yathā cānayostathā 'dharottaradakṣiṇottaraparamāṇupratyāsannānāṃ svabhābānāṃ ca bheda iti ṣaḍaṃśataiva paramāṇornyāyabalādāpatati | yadāha -
SA19n1288:748: na caikāsiddhau anekasyāpi sidhdiriti na santi paramāṇavaḥ |
SA19n1288:749: yadi bāhyo'rtho nāsti kiṃ viṣayastarhyayaṃ pratibhāsaḥ ?
SA19n1288:750: pratibhāsaḥ khalveṣo'nādivitathavāsanātaḥ pravartamāno nirālambana eva lakṣyate |
SA19n1288:754: sa cāyamubhayo'pyanantarokta bādhakapramāṇa [ grāha ] grastavigraho na vyomatāmarasamatiśete yathoktam -
SA19n1288:755: [ na sannāvayavī nāma na santi paramāṇavaḥ |]
SA19n1288:763: yathaikasmādākāśakeśadarśanāt dvitīyam [ jñānaṃ ] anālambanācca svapnajñānādaviśiṣṭaṃ vivādāspadībhūtaṃ jāgradvijñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ ||
SA19n1288:765: yadi bāhyo'rtho nāsti kiṃ tarhi paramārthasat ?
SA19n1288:772: ' bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate |
SA19n1288:775: tatra kecidevamāhuḥ - vijñānamevedaṃ sarva sarvaśarīraviṣayabhāvena prasidhdam ,
SA19n1288:776: tacca svasaṃvedanamiti na kasyacit grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ vā |
SA19n1288:780: anye tu sakalākārakalaṅkānaṅkitaṃ śudhdasfaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāstavaṃ vijñānam |
SA19n1288:782: tasmāt grāhyaṃ nāma nāstyeva grāhyābhāvāt tadapekṣayā yadgrāhakatvaṃ vijñānasya tadapi nāstīti |
SA19n1288:783: mādhyamikānāṃ tu darśane tadapi vijñānaṃ na paramārthasat ,
SA19n1288:785: svabhāvena hi yuktaṃ pāramārthika mucyate loke |
SA19n1288:792: ' bhāvā yena nirupyante tadrūpaṃ nāsti tattvataḥ |
SA19n1288:793: yasmādekamanekaṃ vā rupaṃ teṣu na vidyate ||' iti ||
SA19n1288:795: ' yadā tu na vikalpasya na cānyasya pramāṇatā |
SA19n1288:799: prayogaḥ punarevam - yadekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavati na tatparamārthasat ,
SA19n1288:801: ekānekasvabhāvaṃ ca na bhavati vijñānamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ |
SA19n1288:803: sākāre jñāne bahirartha iva ekānesvabhāvāyogyatvasya parisfuṭatvāt |
SA19n1288:804: yatra hi lokasya bāhyārthavyavahārastadeva sākāravādino jñānam ,
SA19n1288:805: tato yattasya bahirbhāve bādhakaṃ tadevāntarbhāve'pi bādhakam |
SA19n1288:807: vijñānātmakānāmayamākāro yadyekaḥ sthūlo yati vā'nekaḥ paramāṇuśo bhinnaḥ ,
SA19n1288:809: na hi tadvijñāne bahirbhāvanibandhanaṃ dūṣaṇam! yena tadbhāvena bhavet |
SA19n1288:814: śrīmanmahājagaddalavihārīya mahāpaṇḍita bhikṣumokṣākaraguptaviracitāyāṃ tarkabhāṣāyaṃ parārthānumānaparicchedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ ||
SA19n1288:818: * yādṛśaṃ pustake dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā |
SA19n1288:819: yadi śudhdamaśudhdaṃ vā mama doṣo na dīyate ||
